uns:use_case.name: Update a gwt browser applications look and feel on demand.
uns:use_case.uns:step: A Developer or Stylist updates a .css file of a gwt browser application on the server, which is parsed by the browser, and the application (through the css.adligo.org api).
The Developer or Stylist views the application in a web browser and expects the stylesheet to effect all aspects of the application.
